DOC.brief_title: Protocol To Evaluate Patient Measurements After Ultrasonic Treatment
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy Female 20 50 year age , inclusive , day enrolment . 2 . Has BMI 20 30 kg/m2 . 3 . Is treated posterior thigh / saddlebag area use MC1 . 4 . Has never treat MC1 . 5 . Females post menopausal use medically acceptable form birth control prior study enrollment course study . ( i.e. , condom spermicide , oral contraceptive contraceptive implant etc . ) 1 . Subject lactating , positive pregnancy test within 7 day plan study procedure ( female subject childbearing potential ) , intend become pregnant study . 2 . Bone , muscle joint disease , dysfunction heal area treat . 15 . Malignancy area treat . 16 . Laminectomy area treat .
